snippet: Airstrikes carried out by Pakistani forces have killed at least 31 people suspected of being militants in the country’s volatile northwest.
abstract: Pakistani military kill 31 suspected militants in airstrikes on border region in country's northeast; extensive campaign against Pakistani Taliban begun last year saw evacuation of most civilians in area, though some remain.
lead_paragraph: Airstrikes carried out by Pakistani forces have killed at least 31 people suspected of being militants in the country’s volatile northwest.

headline.main: Pakistan: Military Presses Offensive Against Militants
headline.print_headline: Asia; Pakistan: Military Presses Its Offensive in Northwest
